name: LD Mario Maker 0.6
description:
Create your own Mario levels with this level editor!

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/A8X3zjwRJH

Update 0.6, what's new?

-Added new tiles
-Changed a couple visuals
-Added the Mega Mushroom
-Fixed a couple bugs
-Change the menus
-Added a Share feature
-Fixed bowser's movement
-Improved the hit detection for invisible blocks

Editor controls:

Q - Switch to last material
P - Erase everything
WASD - Move camera
Space - Move menu
Backspace - Save
Tab - Enter code
Enter - Load code
1 - Play level
2 - Hide controls
3 - Change background
Shift - Place faster

Arrow keys - Move
Z - Jump
X - Sprint
Esc - Edit
Shift - Screenshot
